items.text: beaten in flight and he's lucky to get an outside edge on this as it turns away from him outside off. Pitch is slow so the bat has a chance as he looks to lift this over cover. Short third man cleans up to his right. Raza is bowling a superb speed
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off stump, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full outside off, steps out to meet it on the full and drives to mid-off
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length and turning into leg stump. Clipped to deep square off the back foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length and lifting up at off stump. Backs away and cuts to sweeper
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length and spinning into off stump. Allows it to turn in and nudges it wide of short third man
items.postText: Shaon: "Really good thinking from both batsmen. Rotating strike and taking less risk when wicket has something for the bowlers at the first 15-20 overs. Can go for shots later in the innings."
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, punched to deep point
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket on the front foot
items.postText: And they've taken drinks. On the other side, Sreshth Shah will call the game.
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Thank you, Varun. These two have helped Bangladesh rebuild after a slow start that also included Anamul's wicket. Here's Sikandar Raza, around the wicket
items.text: on a good length outside off, goes deep into the crease but cuts straight to point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, grip off the surface and turns away from Tamim, cut in front of square off the back foot, goes to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, prods forward and defends with the turn
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full and loopy outside off, big stride forward and blocked
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: drops the length once again. Good length outside off, Tamim stays deep in his crease and cuts this late. Not the connection he was looking for
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: ends the over with a good-length ball outside off once more. Cut off the back foot to the man at point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Malcolm Waller from the other end. Right-arm offspin. Around the wicket to both left handers
items.text: back of a length on middle stump, but angling down the leg side, Tamim tries to flick fine down the leg side, but takes his thigh instead. Trickles down to short fine leg
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, Tamim stays in his crease and tries to pull this behind square, but played along the ground. Straight to square leg. Can't put the loose ball away
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle again. Swivels and pulls once again, but to the man at square leg once more. Great diving effort
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, offers the straight bat and taps it down to mid on
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full ball on middle stump, turns it behind square like a paddle shot, but once again the man at square leg is there for that shot
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length on middle and off, stays on the back foot and punches to cow corner
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: quicker ball, full outside off. Tries to drive away from his body, but slapped to the man at cover point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, down on one knee and swept along the ground. But straight to square leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length outside off, turns away from the left-hander, pokes at it and taps it to point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length outside off, goes straight through this time. Shakib wants to cut but too close to his body. Chopped to point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full just outside off, punched back to Raza off the back foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
